full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 751 Filed 08/10/22 Page 91 of 261 1252
LC6Cmax3 Kate - cross
1 Q. I apologize. I don't mean promoting. I mean promoting sobriety and support for women who had also had addictions?
2 A. I think it's what we offer or what we offered when the foundation was still going.
3 Q. Understood.
4 A. Yes.
5 Q. Fair to say that using and abusing those substances over a ten-year period has had an impact on memory; correct?
6 A. It has not had an impact on the memories that I have always had.
7 Q. The memories that you have always had are your personal memories; correct?
8 A. Yes.
9 Q. And memories based upon your perception of experiences; correct?
10 A. Well, they're just based on my experience.
11 Q. But you have testified today about experiences during a period of time where you were abusing drugs; correct?
12 A. The memories that I testified to were at periods when I was always sober because I was always required to not take drugs and not be drunk around Ghislaine and Jeffrey.
13 Q. Because you knew that they did not tolerate drug use; correct?
14 A. That was what was required.
15 Q. You knew that they did not tolerate drug use; correct?
16 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00012842

text_blocks.content:
1 Q. I apologize. I don't mean promoting. I mean promoting sobriety and support for women who had also had addictions?
2 A. I think it's what we offer or what we offered when the foundation was still going.
3 Q. Understood.
4 A. Yes.
5 Q. Fair to say that using and abusing those substances over a ten-year period has had an impact on memory; correct?
6 A. It has not had an impact on the memories that I have always had.
7 Q. The memories that you have always had are your personal memories; correct?
8 A. Yes.
9 Q. And memories based upon your perception of experiences; correct?
10 A. Well, they're just based on my experience.
11 Q. But you have testified today about experiences during a period of time where you were abusing drugs; correct?
12 A. The memories that I testified to were at periods when I was always sober because I was always required to not take drugs and not be drunk around Ghislaine and Jeffrey.
13 Q. Because you knew that they did not tolerate drug use; correct?
14 A. That was what was required.
15 Q. You knew that they did not tolerate drug use; correct?

additional_notes: The document appears to be a court transcript with a clear and legible format. The text is printed, and there are no visible handwritten notes or stamps. The footer contains the name and contact information of the reporting agency and a reference number.
